name: Talos Machine
description:
Welcome to the year 3142.

The last homo sapiens has died, and as a detective in Ganymede's police department, it is up to you to figure out what happened to her. Since you just transferred here, you'll need to use Omnipedia, the complete encyclopedia, to learn about Ganymede, 3142, and all aspects of this world which might help you solve this case. Who knows ... this might be about more than a single human's demise.

The latest in text adventure technology has given us Talos Machine – an "open website" sci-fi murder mystery. When playing, you have complete freedom to investigate whatever you want. There is no handholding, and it is up to you to form connections and solve the mystery yourself. Don't worry, it's less brutal than it sounds. All you have to do is think like a detective.

Oh, and have fun!

Playing in fullscreen is optional, but recommended. If you can't see the fullscreen button, resize your browser window horizontally and it should appear.

Game created by Aidan Andreasen
